name: FiskBoi
description:
Plays best on windows, but works in the browser.

When a young boy went fishing, his life changed forever. After being slapped by a radioactive fish he is left with the curse of not being able to breath on land, nor under water.

As Fiskboi you must traverse dangerous levels, making sure you spend equal time in water and on land, least you drown! Reach the mysterious green floating orb to continue your adventure.
